variables.label: Seafile Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/seafileltd/seafile-mc/tags

variables.label: Memcached Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/_/memcached?tab=tags

variables.label: MariaDB Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/_/mariadb?tab=tags

variables.label: MariaDB Root Password
variables.description: Default password for root user of MariaDB. Must have at least 8 chars, 1 letter and 1 number

variables.label: Seafile Admin Email
variables.description: Email for admin user of Seafile

variables.label: Seafile Admin Password
variables.description: Password for admin user of Seafile. Must have at least 8 chars, 1 letter and 1 number

variables.label: Seafile Hostname
variables.description: Hostname of Seafile instance (that will be used by it in future)

instructions.start: Seafile is an open source cloud storage system with file encryption and group sharing. For more info visit https://www.seafile.com/
instructions.end:
Seafile has been successfully deployed!
App is available as http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain
Don't forget to add specified hostname to Seafile domains!

description: Seafile is an open source cloud storage system with file encryption and group sharing.
